<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="28" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="32" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" />
<application android:name=".NatrajApplication" android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@drawable/natraj_logo" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@drawable/natraj_logo" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31">
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.SplashActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.MainActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name=".AllProductsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.CategoryProductsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ProductDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".AllProductsActivity" />
<activity android:name=".AddressActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".PaymentActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".AddressActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.OrderConfirmationActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".OrdersActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.WishlistActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.AccountDetailsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".BlogActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".BlogDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".BlogActivity" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.ErrorActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name=".OrderFailureActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.QuickCheckoutActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName=".ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name=".LoginActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name=".ui.activities.SignupActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<service android:name=".util.kafka.KafkaNotificationService" android:enabled="true" android:exported="false" />
<provider android:name="androidx.core.content.FileProvider" android:authorities="${applicationId}.fileprovider" android:exported="false" android:grantUriPermissions="true"> <meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="@xml/file_paths" /> </provider>
</application>
</manifest>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools">
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.POST_NOTIFICATIONS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="28" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" android:maxSdkVersion="32" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" />
<application android:name=".NatrajApplication" android:allowBackup="true" android:dataExtractionRules="@xml/data_extraction_rules" android:fullBackupContent="@xml/backup_rules" android:icon="@drawable/natraj_logo" android:label="@string/app_name" android:roundIcon="@drawable/natraj_logo" android:supportsRtl="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj" android:usesCleartextTraffic="true" tools:targetApi="31">
<!-- Splash and main activities --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.SplashActivity" android:exported="true" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<!-- All products activity --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.AllProductsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Category products (belongs to ui.activities) --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.CategoryProductsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Product detail is in top-level package com.example.natraj --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ProductDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.AllProductsActivity" />
<!-- AddressActivity is declared in com.example.natraj --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.AddressActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- PaymentActivity is in top-level package com.example.natraj --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.PaymentActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.AddressActivity" />
<!-- Order confirmation in ui.activities --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.OrderConfirmationActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Orders (top-level) --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.OrdersActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Wishlist in ui.activities --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.WishlistActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Account details in ui.activities --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.AccountDetailsActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Blog pages are top-level --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.BlogActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<activity android:name="com.example.natraj.BlogDetailActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.BlogActivity" />
<!-- Error and failure activities --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.ErrorActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name="com.example.natraj.OrderFailureActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<!-- Quick checkout --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.QuickCheckoutActivity" android:exported="false" android:parentActivityName="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.MainActivity" />
<!-- Auth activities (Login in top-level, Signup under ui.activities) --> <activity android:name="com.example.natraj.LoginActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<activity android:name="com.example.natraj.ui.activities.SignupActivity" android:exported="false" android:theme="@style/Theme.Natraj.NoActionBar" />
<!-- Kafka notification service --> <service android:name="com.example.natraj.util.kafka.KafkaNotificationService" android:enabled="true" android:exported="false" />
<provider android:name="androidx.core.content.FileProvider" android:authorities="${applicationId}.fileprovider" android:exported="false" android:grantUriPermissions="true"> <meta-data android:name="android.support.FILE_PROVIDER_PATHS" android:resource="@xml/file_paths" /> </provider>
</application>
</manifest>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" android:fillViewport="true" android:scrollbars="none" android:overScrollMode="never">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header with Search and Cart --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="10dp" android:elevation="4dp">
<!-- Top Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Logo/Brand --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Natraj Super" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/search_icon" android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="30dp" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_medium" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<!-- Cart Icon with Badge --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/cart_icon" android:layout_width="28dp" android:layout_height="28dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_badge" android:layout_width="13dp" android:layout_height="13dp" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:background="@drawable/bg_discount" android:gravity="center" android:text="3" android:textColor="@color/discount_text" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Cart Tagline --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="Your Shopping Cart" android:textColor="@color/accent_yellow" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Search Bar --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="2dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/background_card">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/search_bar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:hint="Search cart items..." android:textSize="15sp" android:textColorHint="@color/text_hint" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:padding="0dp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_btn_speak_now" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Cart Items Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Cart Items" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_cart" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" />
<!-- Cart Items List --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/cart_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:clipToPadding="false" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Empty Cart View --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/empty_cart_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:padding="32dp" android:visibility="gone" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@color/background_card">
<ImageView android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" android:tint="@color/text_hint" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:text="Your cart is empty!" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:text="Add items to it now." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="14sp" android:gravity="center" />
<Button android:id="@+id/continue_shopping_btn" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="48dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_primary" android:text="Shop now" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:textAllCaps="false" android:paddingHorizontal="32dp" android:drawableStart="@drawable/ic_shopping_bag" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:elevation="4dp" android:stateListAnimator="@animator/button_press_anim" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Price Details Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cart_summary_card" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:background="@color/white">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Price Details Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PRICE DETAILS" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:padding="16dp" android:letterSpacing="0.05" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingVertical="12dp">
<!-- Price --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_item_count" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Price (3 items)" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/subtotal_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹78,000" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Discount --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Discount" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/discount_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="− ₹3,000" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Delivery Charges --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Delivery Charges" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/delivery_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="FREE" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginVertical="8dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<!-- Total Amount --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Total Amount" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/total_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹75,000" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginVertical="8dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<!-- Savings Message --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="You will save ₹3,000 on this order" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="13sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Place Order Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/checkout_btn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="52dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_orange" android:text="PLACE ORDER" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.05" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Footer Space --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>

<!-- Price Details Header --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PRICE DETAILS" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:padding="16dp" android:letterSpacing="0.05" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="16dp" android:paddingVertical="12dp">
<!-- Price --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_item_count" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Price (3 items)" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/subtotal_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹78,000" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Discount --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Discount" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/discount_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="− ₹3,000" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="14sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Delivery Charges --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Delivery Charges" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/delivery_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="FREE" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginVertical="8dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<!-- Total Amount --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingVertical="4dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Total Amount" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/total_amount" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹75,000" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_marginVertical="8dp" android:background="#E0E0E0" />
<!-- Savings Message --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="You will save ₹3,000 on this order" android:textColor="@color/success" android:textSize="13sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Place Order Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/checkout_btn" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="52dp" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_orange" android:text="PLACE ORDER" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="15sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:letterSpacing="0.05" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Footer Space --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="80dp" />
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_light" android:fillViewport="true" android:scrollbars="none" android:overScrollMode="never">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical">
<!-- Header with Search and Cart --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@color/primary" android:orientation="vertical" android:paddingStart="16dp" android:paddingEnd="16dp" android:paddingTop="16dp" android:paddingBottom="10dp" android:elevation="4dp"> <!-- Top Bar --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<!-- Logo/Brand --> <TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Natraj Super" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="22sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<!-- Search Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/search_icon" android:layout_width="30dp" android:layout_height="30dp" android:layout_marginEnd="@dimen/margin_medium" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<!-- Cart Icon with Badge --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/cart_icon" android:layout_width="28dp" android:layout_height="28dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_cart" android:tint="@color/white" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackgroundBorderless" android:padding="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/cart_badge" android:layout_width="13dp" android:layout_height="13dp" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:background="@drawable/bg_discount" android:gravity="center" android:text="3" android:textColor="@color/discount_text" android:textSize="10sp" android:textStyle="bold" /> </FrameLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Agricultural Equipment Tagline --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="5dp" android:text="Premium Agricultural Equipment" android:textColor="@color/accent_yellow" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingVertical="4dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Search Bar --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="2dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@android:color/white" android:layout_margin="8dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:padding="12dp">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_search" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/search_bar" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:hint="Search for Products, Brands and More" android:textSize="15sp" android:textColorHint="@color/text_hint" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:padding="0dp" android:inputType="text" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:maxLines="1" android:singleLine="true" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_btn_speak_now" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Promotional Banner Carousel --> <androidx.viewpager2.widget.ViewPager2 android:id="@+id/banner_viewpager" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="230dp" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:elevation="4dp" />
<!-- Categories Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Shop by Categories" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/ic_menu_view" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/view_all_categories" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="View All" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textStyle="bold" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="@dimen/padding_small"
/> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/categories_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="@dimen/padding_small" android:orientation="horizontal" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Special Offers Section --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="16dp" app:cardElevation="8dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/white" app:strokeColor="@color/primary_light" app:strokeWidth="1dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text=" Special Offers" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="20sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:fontFamily="sans-serif-medium" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/view_all_offers" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="View All" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="8dp" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/offers_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="400dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:orientation="horizontal" app:layoutManager="androidx.recyclerview.widget.LinearLayoutManager" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/offers_coming_soon" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Festival Offers Coming Soon!" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:padding="16dp" android:visibility="gone" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Recommended Products Section (Grid) --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Recommended Products" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:drawableStart="@android:drawable/btn_star_big_on" android:drawablePadding="8dp" android:gravity="center_vertical"/>
<TextView android:id="@+id/view_all_recommended" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="View All" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textStyle="bold" android:background="?attr/selectableItemBackground" android:padding="@dimen/padding_small" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recommended_products_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_medium" android:clipToPadding="false" android:paddingHorizontal="@dimen/padding_small" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Blog Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="@dimen/padding_medium" android:background="@color/background_card" android:layout_marginTop="@dimen/margin_small">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Latest Articles" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/view_all_blog" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="View All" android:textColor="@color/primary" android:textSize="@dimen/text_size_medium" android:textStyle="bold" /> </LinearLayout>
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/blog_recycler" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:nestedScrollingEnabled="false" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- WhatsApp Order Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:background="@color/success">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp" android:background="@color/success" android:gravity="center_vertical">
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Order on WhatsApp\nGet Special Discount!" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<Button android:id="@+id/whatsapp_order_btn" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Click to WhatsApp" android:textColor="@color/success" android:background="@color/white" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
</LinearLayout> </androidx.core.widget.NestedScrollView>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="8dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/offer_image" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_foreground" />

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="6dp" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" android:background="@color/background_card" android:foreground="?attr/selectableItemBackground">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:background="@color/background_card">
<!-- Product Image Container --> <FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="180dp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/product_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" tools:src="@drawable/ic_launcher_background" />
<!-- NEW Badge --> <TextView android:id="@+id/new_badge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="top|start" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_new" android:paddingHorizontal="10dp" android:paddingVertical="4dp" android:text="NEW" android:textSize="10sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Discount Badge --> <TextView android:id="@+id/discount_badge" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="top|end" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_badge_discount" android:paddingHorizontal="10dp" android:paddingVertical="4dp" android:text="-29%" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textStyle="bold" android:visibility="gone" tools:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Wishlist Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/wishlist_icon" android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="bottom|end" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:padding="6dp" android:background="@drawable/circle_white_bg" android:src="@drawable/ic_favorite" android:tint="@color/text_secondary" /> </FrameLayout>
<!-- Product Info Container --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="12dp" android:paddingTop="0dp">
<!-- Product Name --> <TextView android:id="@+id/product_name" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="AS-580CI Agriculture Sprayer" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:maxLines="2" android:minLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" android:lineSpacingExtra="2dp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="6dp" tools:text="AS-580CI Agriculture Sprayer HTP Pump" />
<!-- Rating Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/rating_container" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_rating_badge" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" android:paddingVertical="3dp" android:visibility="visible">
<TextView android:id="@+id/rating_text" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="5.0" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textStyle="bold" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="★" android:textSize="10sp" android:layout_marginStart="2dp" android:textColor="@android:color/white" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Stock Status --> <TextView android:id="@+id/stock_status" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="In stock" android:textSize="11sp" android:textColor="@color/stock_green" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" android:visibility="visible" />
<!-- Price Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="10dp">
<!-- Current Price --> <TextView android:id="@+id/current_price" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹9,099.00" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" tools:text="₹9,099.00" />
<!-- Original Price and Discount --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/discount_layout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:visibility="visible">
<TextView android:id="@+id/original_price" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="₹12,738.00" android:textSize="13sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" tools:text="Original price: ₹12,738.00" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/discount_text" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="29% OFF" android:textSize="12sp" android:textColor="@color/agricultural_green" android:textStyle="bold" tools:text="29% OFF" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Add to Cart Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/add_to_cart_button" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:text="ADD" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/white" android:background="@drawable/bg_button_add_to_cart" android:elevation="2dp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
